00039         GenericDataHdrs.clear();

00082 void GenericDataHeader::AddNameValParam(const ParameterNameValueType &entry)
00083 {
00084         ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = FindNameValParam(entry);
00085         if (ii == nameValParams.end())
00086         {
00087                 // Add
00088                 nameValParams.push_back(entry);
00089         }
00090         else
00091         {
00092                 // Update
00093                 *ii = entry;
00094         }
00095 }
00096 
00097 ParameterNameValueType GenericDataHeader::GetNameValParam(int32_t index)
00098 {
00099         return nameValParams[index];
00100 }

00102 int32_t GenericDataHeader::GetNameValParamCnt() const
00103 {
00104         return (int32_t)nameValParams.size();
00105 }

00107 void GenericDataHeader::GetNameValIterators(ParameterNameValueTypeIt &begin, ParameterNameValueTypeIt &end)
00108 {
00109         begin = nameValParams.begin();
00110         end = nameValParams.end();
00111 }

00115         GenericDataHdrs.push_back(hdr);

00121         end = GenericDataHdrs.end();

00134 /*
00135  * Find an immediate parent GenericDataHeader based on file type id.  Does not search grand-parents or above.
00136  */
00137 GenericDataHeader* GenericDataHeader::FindParent(const std::string& fileTypeId)
00138 {
00139         GenericDataHeader* parentGDH = 0;
00140         GenDataHdrVectorIt begin, end;
00141         GetParentIterators(begin, end);
00142         for (GenDataHdrVectorIt ii = begin; ii != end; ++ii)
00143         {
00144                 if (ii->GetFileTypeId() == fileTypeId)
00145                 {
00146                         parentGDH = &(*ii);
00147                         break;
00148                 }
00149         }
00150         return parentGDH;
00151 }
00152 
00153 bool GenericDataHeader::FindNameValParam(const std::wstring& name, ParameterNameValueType& result)
00154 {
00155         ParameterNameValueType t;
00156         t.SetName(name);
00157         t.SetValueText(L"");
00158         ParameterNameValueTypeIt found = FindNameValParam(t);
00159         if (found != nameValParams.end())
00160         {
00161                 result = *found;
00162                 return true;
00163         }
00164         return false;
00165 }
00166 
00167 ParameterNameValueTypeIt GenericDataHeader::FindNameValParam(const ParameterNameValueType& p)
00168 {
00169         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin, end;
00170         begin = nameValParams.begin();
00171         end = nameValParams.end();
00172 
00173         ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = std::find(begin, end, p);
00174         if (ii != end)
00175         {
00176                 return ii;
00177         }
00178         else
00179                 return end;
00180 }
00181 
00182 bool GenericDataHeader::GetNameValParamsBeginsWith(const std::wstring& beginsWith, ParameterNameValueTypeVector& p)
00183 {
00184         p.clear();
00185 
00186         for (ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = nameValParams.begin(); ii != nameValParams.end(); ++ii)
00187         {
00188                 if (ii->GetName().find(beginsWith) == 0)
00189                 {
00190                         p.push_back(*ii);
00191                 }
00192         }
00193         return (p.size() > 0);
00194 }
